articles.description: Arsenal survive painful flashbacks of giving up handsome leads last season to maintain their Premier League title push at Tottenham, writes Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Tottenham 2-3 Arsenal: 'Arsenal survive painful flashbacks to maintain title push'

articles.description: Manchester City striker Erling Haaland said it was "good to be back" after scoring to help his side to victory against Nottingham Forest.
articles.title: Erling Haaland: Man City striker key to Premier League title race

articles.description: BBC Scotland has a look at the state of play in the Premiership title race with just four games remaining.
articles.title: Celtic & Rangers fight for Scottish Premiership title

articles.description: Stuart Hogg says he has "reset" at a rehabilitation clinic after being arrested and charged last month.
articles.title: Stuart Hogg: Ex-Scotland captain 'resets' in rehab after arrest

articles.description: The LA Clippers hold off an epic fightback from the Dallas Mavericks to win 116-111 and level the best-of-seven series at 2-2 in the Western Conference play-offs.
articles.title: NBA play-offs: LA Clippers hold off epic Dallas Mavericks fightback to level series

articles.description: Seven-time world champion Ronnie O'Sullivan makes a strong start to his last-16 match against Wales' Ryan Day.
articles.title: World Snooker Championship: Ronnie O'Sullivan leads Ryan Day in last 16

articles.description: Mary Fowler's second-half double helps Manchester City beat Bristol City to move six points clear at the Women's Super League summit as the Robins' relegation is confirmed.
articles.title: Man City go six points clear as Bristol City relegated

articles.description: England all-rounder Will Jacks smashed an unbeaten century off just 41 balls to help Royal Challengers Bangalore beat Gujarat Titans by nine wickets in the IPL.
articles.title: IPL 2024 results: Will Jacks hits unbeaten century as Royal Challengers Bangalore beat Gujarat Titans

articles.description: Paris St-Germain clinch their third consecutive Ligue 1 title after second-placed Monaco fall to a 3-2 defeat against Lyon.
articles.title: Paris St-Germain clinch Ligue 1 title after Monaco defeat

articles.description: Irish pair Rory McIlroy and Shane Lowry win the Zurich Classic of New Orleans after beating Chad Ramey and Martin Trainer in a play-off.
articles.title: McIlroy & Lowry win Zurich Classic title in play-off
